statements: SELECT campaign_name, total_recipients, open_rate FROM email_campaign_data;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaign_data WHERE total_recipients > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, click_rate FROM email_campaign_data WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, total_recipients, open_rate, click_rate FROM email_campaign_data ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_recipients, open_rate, click_rate FROM email_campaign_data ORDER BY total_recipients DESC, click_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM email_campaign_data WHERE total_recipients > 1000 ORDER BY open_rate DESC, click_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaign_data WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_name, total_recipients, open_rate, click_rate FROM email_campaign_data WHERE click_rate > 0.1 AND open_rate > 0.15;

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, total_recipients, open_rate * 100 AS open_rate_percentage, click_rate * 100 AS click_rate_percentage FROM email_campaign_data WHERE total_recipients BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, total_recipients, open_rate, click_rate FROM email_campaign_data WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT total_recipients, total_opened, total_clicked FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, target_audience FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, total_recipients, total_opened, total_clicked FROM email_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Marketing' ORDER BY total_clicked DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, target_audience, total_opened FROM email_campaigns WHERE total_opened > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, total_recipients, total_clicked FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY total_clicked DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, open_rate, click_rate, conversion_rate, revenue_generated FROM email_campaigns INNER JOIN campaign_performance ON email_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_performance.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, email_subject FROM EmailCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT recipient_name, recipient_email FROM CampaignRecipients WHERE recipient_status = 'active';
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(open_count), SUM(click_count), SUM(conversion_count) FROM CampaignPerformance GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM CampaignRecipients WHERE recipient_email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM EmailCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, campaign_name
SELECT * FROM CampaignRecipients WHERE recipient_status = 'active' AND recipient_name LIKE 'J%'

SELECT campaign_name, recipient_email, open_count FROM EmailCampaigns JOIN CampaignRecipients ON EmailCampaigns.campaign_id = CampaignRecipients.campaign_id JOIN CampaignPerformance ON CampaignRecipients.recipient_id = CampaignPerformance.recipient_id WHERE CampaignPerformance.open_count > 10
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id FROM CampaignPerformance WHERE conversion_count >= 5

SELECT campaign_name, recipient_name, open_count, click_count FROM EmailCampaigns JOIN CampaignRecipients ON EmailCampaigns.campaign_id = CampaignRecipients.campaign_id JOIN CampaignPerformance ON CampaignRecipients.recipient_id = CampaignPerformance.recipient_id WHERE open_count > 0 AND click_count > 0 ORDER BY open_count DESC
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, total_recipients FROM EmailCampaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, total_opened, total_clicked FROM EmailCampaigns ORDER BY total_recipients DESC;
SELECT * FROM CampaignAnalytics WHERE total_conversions > 50;
SELECT campaign_name, total_opened, total_clicked FROM EmailCampaigns JOIN CampaignAnalytics USING (campaign_id) WHERE analytics_date = '2022-08-20';
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_clicked FROM EmailCampaigns WHERE total_clicked > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM EmailCampaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT ec.campaign_name, cr.first_name, cr.last_name FROM EmailCampaigns ec INNER JOIN EmailRecipients cr ON ec.total_recipients = cr.recipient_id;

SELECT ca.analytics_date, ec.campaign_name, cr.email_address FROM CampaignAnalytics ca LEFT JOIN EmailCampaigns ec ON ca.campaign_id = ec.campaign_id LEFT JOIN EmailRecipients cr ON ca.total_conversions > 5 AND cr.email_address = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM EmailCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CampaignContacts WHERE email_address = 'example@email.com';
SELECT campaign_name, sent_emails, opened_emails, clicked_emails FROM CampaignPerformance WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT segment_name, total_contacts FROM CampaignAudience WHERE total_contacts > 1000 ORDER BY total_contacts DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, sent_emails FROM EmailCampaigns WHERE sent_emails > 100;
SELECT * FROM CampaignContacts ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, date, total_clicked_emails FROM CampaignPerformance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT campaign_id, segment_name, total_contacts FROM CampaignAudience WHERE total_contacts < 500;
